title: Cloud VAR in Scratch to create TwitchPlay game from Python. (Cool trick)
description:
In this video, I show you how you can use Cloud Var in python to create a Twitch Play kind of game where the community can interact with you on your computer. 
More about it: https://github.com/EloiStree/2024_02_02_HelloCarRcFromScratch
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
